page.title: 13Arts and Crafts Sculpture(1)
page.content: Adriano Candelori was born in the town of Terni,near Assisi.The consciousness of beauty in Architecture,Painting and Sculptures,is close to the Italian way of life,as they live,work and play among the treasures and sculptures that abound around them. Inspired by this love of beauty and the creative desire to reproduce it in every form of art,Adriano has strived to continue to add to the achievements of the past,for the future. In his early days he was unfortunate in that his sensit- ivity and love of art and beauty was suffocated by the Second World War and the German occupation of Terni. After the war,the rebuilding and search for work compelled many to leave home and country to look for work outside war-torn Italy.{Adriano came to Wales, {to Llanelli, to work for the Steel {Company of Wales.
